meanings.sent1: She stood uprightly with her back straight.
meanings.sent2: The flag waved uprightly in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The tree grew so uprightly, it almost touched the sky!
meanings.sent4: The skyscraper towered uprightly over the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: The candle burned uprightly, casting a tall shadow on the wall.

meanings.definition: In a moral and honest way.
meanings.sent1: He always behaves uprightly and never tells lies.
meanings.sent2: The judge ruled uprightly, following the law.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked at me so uprightly, as if it knew my secrets!
meanings.sent4: Her words cut through the room, uprightly piercing the silence.
meanings.sent5: The old man lived uprightly, earning the respect of all who knew him.
